scripts.build:prod: npm run content:all && npx wrangler build -e prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run content:all && npx wrangler build -e dev
scripts.preview: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler dev -e prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler deploy -e prod
scripts.upload: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler upload -e prod
scripts.preview:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler dev -e dev
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler deploy -e dev
scripts.upload:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler upload -e dev
scripts.content:all: npm run content:precompile && npm run content:redirects && npm run content:sitemap && npm run tree
scripts.tree: bash -c 'pattern="$(( sed "/^\s*#/d;/^$/d" .gitignore; echo .next; echo node_modules ) | tr "\n" "|" | sed "s/|$//")"; tree -I "$pattern" > file-structure.txt'
